summary:
**Super Mario Bros.** is a classic video game made by Nintendo for the NES. It came out in 1985 in Japan and later in other countries. Players control Mario or Luigi to save Princess Toadstool from King Koopa. The game has side-scrolling levels with challenges like enemies and pits. Power-ups like Super Mushrooms and Fire Flowers help Mario.

The game is famous for its fun controls and cute characters. It sold over 58 million copies and helped make video games popular again after a big drop in their success. Mario has since become a huge star with many games, TV shows, and even movies.
title: Super Mario Bros.
